text: Hanki tamagratamia kva hutma maniho. Kanisolo vahete tamavare'za nevu'za, osi mono nompinti tamavre'za kanonkeve ome nerami'za, rankuma kva vahete'ene kini vahe zamavure tamavrentesageta otigahaze. Na'ankure nagriteku ana hanageno, e'i anazama fore'ma haniana nagri musenkema eri'ama hutma nezmasami'za zanteku fore hugahie.
